SDG_INDICATOR_INFO: This indicator provides the proportion of the total population and the proportion of the employed population living in households with per-capita consumption or income that is below the international poverty line of US$1.90
SDG_GOAL: Goal 1: End poverty in all its forms everywhere.
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 1.1.1: Proportion of population below the international poverty line, by sex, age, employment status and geographical location (urban/rural)
CONTACT_ORGANISATION: Ghana Statistical Service, Ghana Living Standards Survey
STAT_CONC_DEF: Percentage of persons living in households living below the international poverty line
DATA_COMP: It is calculated by dividing the number of persons living in households below the international poverty line by the total number of persons living in households
